characters: Driver of a white sedan, motorcyclist
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a city road during sunset. The road is wet, indicating recent rain. A white sedan is ahead, and a motorcyclist appears on the right side. The motorcyclist loses control and falls in front of the self-driving vehicle.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed initially but starts to decelerate as the motorcyclist appears and eventually falls. The vehicles speed decreases to avoid collision with the fallen motorcyclist.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 20 meters away, maintaining a steady speed. 2) Right: A motorcyclist, approximately 5 meters away, initially moving forward but loses control and falls in front of the self-driving vehicle.
